name: Healthyfied Beef Tendon Kaldereta
description: This Healthyfied Beef Tendon Kaldereta is a perfect combination of healthful eating and indulgent flavors. Designed for those who love high-protein and low-sugar diets, this recipe transforms a classic dish into a healthier alternative without compromising taste. Whether you're following a health-conscious lifestyle or simply looking for a nutritious meal, this healthy twist on the traditional Kaldereta is sure to impress.

recipeInstructions.text: Wash the beef tendon thoroughly and cut into bite-sized pieces.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: Peel and chop the potato, red bell pepper, green bell pepper, and white onion into equal sizes to ensure even cooking.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: In a pot, add the beef tendon and water. Bring to a boil and simmer for about 1 hour 30 minutes or until the tendon is tender.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: Remove the tendon from the pot, set aside, and discard the water.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5

recipeInstructions.text: In the same pot, heat a little oil over medium heat and sauté the minced garlic until golden brown, about 2 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 6

recipeInstructions.text: Add the cut vegetables (potato, red bell pepper, green bell pepper, and white onion) to the pot and sauté for another 5 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 7

recipeInstructions.text: Return the beef tendon to the pot and add the tomato sauce, stirring well to combine. Season with black pepper and salt.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 8

recipeInstructions.text: Cover the pot and let the kaldereta simmer on low heat for about 20 minutes, or until the vegetables are tender and the sauce has thickened.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 9

recipeInstructions.text: Serve your Healthyfied Beef Tendon Kaldereta hot and enjoy this nutritious twist on a classic Filipino comfort food.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 10
